title: Nekonline
description:
A virtual pet widget that sits above the OriginOS dock, displaying all online users as cute lil kitty cats.
Controls:
- Each cat cooresponds to a user actively on OriginOS. You and your Rotur friends are highlighted.
- Cats can be dragged around by clicking and holding them.
- The app can be shut down at any time by using the hotkey Ctrl + Down Arrow.
author: Nameless
